options.content:
## Kubernetes 노드 & 파드 상태 대시보드

이 대시보드는 Kubernetes 클러스터의 노드와 파드 상태 및 리소스 사용량을 종합적으로 모니터링합니다. 상단의 **Node**와 **Namespace** 필터를 사용하여 특정 범위의 데이터를 심층 분석할 수 있습니다.

**주요 섹션:**
- **클러스터 개요**: 클러스터의 노드 및 파드 상태를 요약하여 보여줍니다.
- **노드 상태 및 리소스**: 각 노드의 상태와 CPU/메모리 사용량을 시각화합니다.
- **파드 상태 및 리소스**: 파드의 단계별 수, 비정상 파드 목록, 리소스 사용량 Top 10을 제공합니다.
- **워크로드별 파드 상태**: 워크로드(Deployment, StatefulSet) 단위로 파드 상태를 집계하여 보여줍니다.

targets.expr: sum(kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready", status="true", node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready", status!="true", node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready", status="true", node=~"$node"}

(1 - avg by (node) (label_replace(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes, "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*")) / avg by (node) (label_replace(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes, "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*"))) * 100
(1 - avg by (node) (label_replace(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m]), "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*"))) * 100
sum by (phase) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})

panels.title: 비정상 상태 파드 목록 (Pending, Failed, Unknown)

targets.expr: (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Failed|Unknown", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}) == 1
topk(10, sum by (pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}))
topk(10, sum by (pod, namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}))

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"})

title: Kubernetes 노드 & 파드 상태 대시보드 (상세 분석)

targets.expr: (1 - avg by (node) (label_replace(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes, "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*")) / avg by (node) (label_replace(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes, "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*"))) * 100
(1 - avg by (node) (label_replace(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m]), "node", "$1", "instance", "([^:]+):.*"))) * 100
sum by (phase) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
(kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Failed|Unknown", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}) == 1

type.title: 비정상 상태 파드 목록 (Pending, Failed, Unknown)

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
count by (namespace) (kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node"})
topk(10, sum by (pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}))
topk(10, sum by (pod, namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"}))
kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node"}
kube_pod_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1
sum by (pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))
sum by (pod, namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}) / 1024 / 1024

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"})

sum by (namespace, workload, workload_type) (namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload_type=~"deployment|statefulset", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Unknown"})

title: Kubernetes 노드 & 파드 상태 대시보드 (상세 분석)
